title: Kentwood Chiropractic
cleaned_text: CHIROPRACTIC CARE A specialized form of healthcare in which the biomechanical movements of the joints of the body, primarily the spine, are analyzed. With gentle correction, optimum communication is restored between the brain and the body. CLASSICAL HOMEOPATHY Homeopathy uses minute doses of natural substances to stimulate a person's inherent ability to heal themselves on all levels: mental, emotional and physical. NUTRITION Nutrition is an integral part of health and we offer quality supplements and herbs to enhance healing and support your health and longevity. There is a vast difference between treating the effects and adjusting the cause.D.D. Palmer ABOUT Dr. Leslie Lauterbach-Davis graduated cum laude in Psychology from UCLA. She graduated magna cum laude from Cleveland Chiropractic College and received further postgraduate education in Applied Kinesiology, Homeopathy and BodyTalk among others. She worked as a teacher and clinician for Cleveland Chiropractic College and Quantum University. She is a former examiner for the National Board of Chiropractic Examiners. Her goal is to treat the whole person and not just chase symptoms. She wants to get at the root cause whether its physical, mental, or emotional. She strives to resolve patients' issues as quickly as possible and empower them to maintain their own health.
